languages.text: {n}Вокс-имплант Паскаля испускает траурный бинарный стон.{/n} "Ритуал свято-диагностики прерван. Причина: примитивный метод утилизации объекта познания..." {n}Визор техножреца вспыхивает алым, затем устало потухает.{/n} "...имевшего девяностовосьмипроцентную вероятность анафематического происхождения".

traits.locale_text: [draft] {n}Вокс-имплант Паскаля испускает траурный бинарный стон.{/n} "Ритуал свято-диагностики кощунственно прерван. Причина: примитивный метод утилизации уникальной реликвии Познания". {n}На мгновение вспыхнув кроваво-алым, люмены техножреца устало потухают — один за другим.{/n} "С девяностовосьмипроцентной вероятностью, анафематического происхождения".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal's vox lets out a mournful binharic groan.{/n} "The rite of sacred diagnostics has been interrupted. Cause of interruption: a primitive method of disposal was employed against the object of study..." {n}The Tech-Priest's visor flashes red before dimming wearily.{/n} "...which had a ninety-eight percent chance of being of anathematic origin."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс-имплант Паскаля испускает траурный бинарный стон.{/n} "Ритуал свято-диагностики прерван. Причина: примитивный метод утилизации объекта познания..." {n}Визор техножреца вспыхивает алым, затем устало потухает.{/n} "...имевшего девяностовосьмипроцентную вероятность анафематического происхождения".

languages.text: {n}Aus Pasqals Vox ertönt ein klagendes binhärisches Stöhnen.{/n} "Das Ritual der heiligen Diagnose wurde unterbrochen. Grund der Unterbrechung: Das Studienobjekt wurde einer primitiven Methode der Entsorgung ausgesetzt ..." {n}Der Visor des Techpriesters blinkt rot und verblasst dann müde.{/n} "... dabei bestand eine Chance von 98 Prozent, dass es anathematischen Ursprungs war."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox lets out a mournful binharic groan.{/n} "The rite of sacred diagnostics has been interrupted. Cause of interruption: a primitive method of disposal was employed against the object of study..." {n}The Tech-Priest's visor flashes red before dimming wearily.{/n} "...which had a ninety-eight percent chance of being of anathematic origin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus Pasqals Vox ertönt ein klagendes binhärisches Stöhnen.{/n} "Das Ritual der heiligen Diagnose wurde unterbrochen. Grund der Unterbrechung: Das Studienobjekt wurde einer primitiven Methode der Entsorgung ausgesetzt ..." {n}Der Visor des Techpriesters blinkt rot und verblasst dann müde.{/n} "... dabei bestand eine Chance von 98 Prozent, dass es anathematischen Ursprungs war."

languages.text: {n}Un grognement désespéré s'échappe du vox de Pasqal.{/n} « Le rite des diagnostics sacrés a été interrompu. Cause de l'interruption : une méthode d'élimination primitive a été employée à l'encontre de l'élément étudié... {n}La visière de Pasqal émet un clignotement rouge avant de s'éteindre tristement.{/n} Une méthode ayant quatre-vingt-dix-huit pour cent de chances d'être d'origine anathématique. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox lets out a mournful binharic groan.{/n} "The rite of sacred diagnostics has been interrupted. Cause of interruption: a primitive method of disposal was employed against the object of study..." {n}The Tech-Priest's visor flashes red before dimming wearily.{/n} "...which had a ninety-eight percent chance of being of anathematic origin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un grognement désespéré s'échappe du vox de Pasqal.{/n} « Le rite des diagnostics sacrés a été interrompu. Cause de l'interruption : une méthode d'élimination primitive a été employée à l'encontre de l'élément étudié... {n}La visière de Pasqal émet un clignotement rouge avant de s'éteindre tristement.{/n} Une méthode ayant quatre-vingt-dix-huit pour cent de chances d'être d'origine anathématique. »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵装置中发出了哀伤的二进制语呻吟声。{/n}“神圣的诊断仪式中断了。中断原因：研究对象遭到了某种原始手段的改造……”{n}帕斯卡的面甲闪烁着红光，随后，光芒疲惫地黯淡下来。{/n}“……研究对象有98%的几率成为了诅咒造物。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox lets out a mournful binharic groan.{/n} "The rite of sacred diagnostics has been interrupted. Cause of interruption: a primitive method of disposal was employed against the object of study..." {n}The Tech-Priest's visor flashes red before dimming wearily.{/n} "...which had a ninety-eight percent chance of being of anathematic origin."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵装置中发出了哀伤的二进制语呻吟声。{/n}“神圣的诊断仪式中断了。中断原因：研究对象遭到了某种原始手段的改造……”{n}帕斯卡的面甲闪烁着红光，随后，光芒疲惫地黯淡下来。{/n}“……研究对象有98%的几率成为了诅咒造物。”

languages.text: {n}El voco de Pasqal emite un quejido binario apenado.{/n} «El rito de los sagrados diagnósticos se ha interrumpido. Causa de la interrupción: utilización de un método primitivo de eliminación contra el objeto de estudio...». {n}El visor del tecnosacerdote brilla en rojo antes de atenuarse sin energía.{/n} «... Que tenía una probabilidad del noventa y ocho por ciento de ser de origen anatémico».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox lets out a mournful binharic groan.{/n} "The rite of sacred diagnostics has been interrupted. Cause of interruption: a primitive method of disposal was employed against the object of study..." {n}The Tech-Priest's visor flashes red before dimming wearily.{/n} "...which had a ninety-eight percent chance of being of anathematic origin."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco de Pasqal emite un quejido binario apenado.{/n} «El rito de los sagrados diagnósticos se ha interrumpido. Causa de la interrupción: utilización de un método primitivo de eliminación contra el objeto de estudio...». {n}El visor del tecnosacerdote brilla en rojo antes de atenuarse sin energía.{/n} «... Que tenía una probabilidad del noventa y ocho por ciento de ser de origen anatémico».

languages.text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスが、悲しみに染まったバイナリック語の呻きを発した。{/n}「神聖な診断の儀式が中断されました。中断の原因：研究対象に対して原始的な処分方法が用いられたため…」{n}技術司祭のバイザーが赤く点滅し、やがて疲れたように薄暗くなる。{/n}「…対象は98パーセントの確率で呪われた起源の出身です」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox lets out a mournful binharic groan.{/n} "The rite of sacred diagnostics has been interrupted. Cause of interruption: a primitive method of disposal was employed against the object of study..." {n}The Tech-Priest's visor flashes red before dimming wearily.{/n} "...which had a ninety-eight percent chance of being of anathematic origin."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスが、悲しみに染まったバイナリック語の呻きを発した。{/n}「神聖な診断の儀式が中断されました。中断の原因：研究対象に対して原始的な処分方法が用いられたため…」{n}技術司祭のバイザーが赤く点滅し、やがて疲れたように薄暗くなる。{/n}「…対象は98パーセントの確率で呪われた起源の出身です」

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksu, hüzünlü bir ikilidil inleme çıkarıyor.{/n} "Kutsal tanı ayini kesintiye uğradı. Kesinti nedeni: İnceleme nesnesine karşı ilkel bir imha yöntemi kullanıldı..." {n}Tekno Rahip'in vizörü, yorgun bir şekilde kararıp sonrasında kırmızı renkte yanıp sönüyor.{/n} "Nesnenin saf kötü kökenden gelme olasılığı yüzde doksan sekizdi."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox lets out a mournful binharic groan.{/n} "The rite of sacred diagnostics has been interrupted. Cause of interruption: a primitive method of disposal was employed against the object of study..." {n}The Tech-Priest's visor flashes red before dimming wearily.{/n} "...which had a ninety-eight percent chance of being of anathematic origin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksu, hüzünlü bir ikilidil inlemesi çıkarıyor.{/n} "Kutsal teşhis ritüeli kesintiye uğradı. Kesinti nedeni: İnceleme nesnesine karşı ilkel bir imha yöntemi kullanıldı..." {n}Tekno Rahip'in vizörü kırmızı renkte yanıp sönmeden önce yorgun bir şekilde kararıyor.{/n} "Nesnenin saf kötü kökenden gelme olasılığı yüzde doksan sekizdi."
